name: Margarita
instructions: Rim a margarita glass with salt.
Add tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau to a shaker with ice.
Shake well for 15-20 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into the prepared glass over fresh ice.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: In a rocks glass, muddle the sugar cube, bitters, and a splash of water until sugar is dissolved.
Fill the glass with a large ice cube.
Pour the whiskey over the ice.
Stir gently until well-chilled.
Express the oil of an orange peel over the glass, then drop it in.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Martini
instructions: Add gin and dry vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice.
Stir gently for 30 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive.

name: Gin & Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in the gin.
Top with tonic water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice.
Pour in the vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Mojito
instructions: In a highball glass, gently muddle the mint leaves and sugar.
Add the lime juice and rum, then stir to dissolve the sugar.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Add all ingredients (Vodka, Cointreau, lime juice, cranberry juice) to a shaker with ice.
Shake well for 15-20 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Add whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass filled with ice.
Stir gently for 30 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass.
Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Add whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and optional egg white to a shaker.
If using egg white, 'dry shake' (without ice) for 15 seconds.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again vigorously for 30 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange peel and a cherry.

name: Negroni
instructions: Add the gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth to a rocks glass filled with ice.
Stir gently until well-chilled (about 20-30 seconds).
Express the oil of an orange peel over the glass, then drop it in as garnish.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire, Tabasco, salt, and pepper in a shaker with ice.
Shake gently or 'roll' the shaker to combine.
Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a celery stalk and any other desired garnishes (like olives or a lime wedge).

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Add light rum, lime juice, orange curaçao, and orgeat to a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.
Gently float the dark rum on top.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime wheel.

name: Pina Colada
instructions: Add rum, cream of coconut, pineapple juice, and crushed ice to a blender.
Blend until smooth and frothy.
Pour into a chilled hurricane or highball glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Gimlet
instructions: Add gin, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: French 75
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a flute and top with Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass over ice.
Add Prosecco, then Aperol, then top with soda water.
Gently stir once and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice and add tequila and orange juice.
Slowly pour grenadine so it sinks and creates a sunrise gradient.
Do not stir; garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a flute.
Top gently with chilled Champagne.
Do not stir; serve immediately.

name: Paloma
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

name: Rum Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

name: Whiskey Smash
instructions: Muddle mint and syrup in a rocks glass.
Add lemon juice and whiskey, then fill with crushed ice.
Stir gently and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Sidecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Double strain into a sugar-rimmed coupe glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Dark and Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add lime juice and ginger beer.
Float the dark rum on top for a layered effect.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

name: Mai Tai Royale
instructions: Shake all ingredients except Prosecco with ice.
Strain into a tiki glass filled with crushed ice.
Top with Prosecco and stir gently.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a chilled glass without ice.
Top with soda and let foam form naturally.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Combine hot coffee, whiskey, and sugar in a warm mug.
Stir to dissolve sugar.
Top gently with whipped cream.

name: Smoky Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel and smoked salt rim.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
instructions: Build in a rocks glass filled with ice.
Add Aperol and vermouth, then top with Prosecco.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: New York Sour
instructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain over ice into a rocks glass.
Gently float red wine on top using a spoon.

name: Cuba Libre
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice.
Add rum, lime juice, and cola.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Add ingredients to a rocks glass with ice.
Stir gently until chilled.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Rum Espresso Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients without ice (dry shake).
Add ice and shake again until frothy.
Double strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with cocoa powder.

name: Whiskey Mule
instructions: Build in a copper mug over ice.
Stir gently and garnish with lime and mint.

name: Tequila Negroni
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Rum Old Fashioned
instructions: Build in a rocks glass over ice.
Stir until chilled and garnish with orange peel.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place sugar cube in a flute and add bitters.
Top slowly with chilled Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Honey Bourbon Smash
instructions: Muddle mint with honey syrup.
Add bourbon and lemon juice, then shake with ice.
Strain over ice and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Prosecco Royale
instructions: Add cassis to a flute and top with Prosecco.
Garnish with a raspberry.

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with orange twist.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a sugar-rimmed martini glass.
Garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Mezcal Paloma
instructions: Shake tequila, mezcal, and juices with ice.
Strain into a highball with fresh ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with grapefruit wedge.

name: Brandy Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Gin Basil Smash
instructions: Muddle basil with syrup and lemon juice.
Add gin and ice, then shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass with ice and garnish with basil leaf.

name: Rum Espresso
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

name: Tequila Honey Bee
instructions: Shake tequila, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a coupe glass and top with a dash of bitters.

name: French Connection
instructions: Build ingredients over ice in a rocks glass.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange peel.

name: Vodka Collins
instructions: Shake vodka, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda and garnish with lemon slice.

name: Rum Punch Royale
instructions: Shake all ingredients except Prosecco with ice.
Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
Top with Prosecco and stir gently.

name: Aperol Negroni
instructions: Add all ingredients to a rocks glass filled with ice.
Stir until chilled and garnish with orange peel.

name: Whiskey Ginger
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice.
Add whiskey and top with ginger ale.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Golden Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Double strain into a coupe glass.
Garnish with lime twist.

name: Vodka Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass with ice.
Add vodka, top with Prosecco and soda water.
Garnish with lemon slice.

name: Smoky Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain over a large cube and garnish with orange peel.

name: Tequila Fizz
instructions: Shake tequila, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Whiskey Clover Club
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients (no ice) for 15 seconds.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with raspberry.

name: Champagne Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint with syrup and lime juice.
Add rum, stir, then top with Champagne.
Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Strawberry Gin Smash
instructions: Muddle strawberries with syrup and lemon juice.
Add gin and ice, shake briefly.
Strain over ice and top with soda water.

name: Bourbon Sidecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a sugar-rimmed coupe glass.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Coconut Rum Cooler
instructions: Build in a highball with ice.
Add rum and juices, top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Aperol Gin Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass filled with ice.
Add gin, Aperol, and Prosecco.
Top with soda and garnish with orange slice.

name: Mezcal Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients to foam.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Rum Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with lime twist.

name: Brandy Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar, bitters, and soda in a rocks glass.
Add brandy and ice, stir gently.
Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Vodka Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint and sugar in a highball glass.
Add lime juice and vodka, fill with ice.
Top with soda and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Gin Rickey
instructions: Build gin and lime juice over ice.
Top with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Bourbon Smash
instructions: Muddle mint with syrup and lemon juice.
Add bourbon and shake with ice.
Strain over ice and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Rum Manhattan
instructions: Stir with ice until chilled.
Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with cherry.

name: Prosecco Margarita
instructions: Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice.
Strain into a coupe and top with Prosecco.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Bourbon Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Champagne Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass filled with ice.
Add Champagne, Aperol, and soda water.
Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Rum Espresso Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients without ice (dry shake).
Add ice and shake again until frothy.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with nutmeg.

name: Tequila Smash
instructions: Muddle mint and syrup in a rocks glass.
Add tequila, lime juice, and ice.
Stir and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Bourbon Cherry Fizz
instructions: Shake bourbon, cherry juice, and lemon juice with ice.
Strain into a highball filled with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with cherry.

name: Rum Mule
instructions: Build in a copper mug filled with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Mezcal Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a coupe glass with salted rim.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: French Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass filled with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with lemon twist.

name: Spiced Rum Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Bourbon Flip
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients without ice.
Add ice and shake again until frothy.
Strain into a coupe and grate nutmeg on top.

name: Vodka Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Gin Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass filled with ice.
Stir and garnish with cucumber slice.

name: Smoky Paloma
instructions: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice.
Strain into a highball with fresh ice and top with soda.
Garnish with grapefruit wedge.

name: Bourbon Spritz
instructions: Build over ice in a wine glass.
Stir gently and garnish with orange twist.

name: Rum Espresso Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with lemon twist.

name: Citrus Champagne Fizz
instructions: Pour juices into a flute.
Top with chilled Champagne and garnish with lemon twist.

name: Negroni Royale
instructions: Build over ice and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Whiskey Bramble
instructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into rocks glass with ice and drizzle liqueur over top.
Garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Maple Bourbon Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain over fresh ice into rocks glass.
Garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Aperol Tequila Spritz
instructions: Build in wine glass with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with orange wedge.

name: Honey Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice.
Strain into highball and top with soda water.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Rum Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Vodka Gimlet
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Whiskey Mule
instructions: Build in copper mug over ice.
Stir gently and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Tequila Negroni
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into rocks glass.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Gin & Aperol Collins
instructions: Shake all but soda with ice.
Strain into Collins glass and top with soda.
Garnish with orange slice.

name: Bourbon & Aperol Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar and bitters in a rocks glass.
Add Aperol and bourbon with ice, stir gently.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Algonquin
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and/or maraschino cherry.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or apple slice.

name: Antibes
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Applejack Rabbit
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon wheel and candied ginger.

name: Aviation Royale
instructions: Shake gin, maraschino, crème de violette, and lemon juice with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Float champagne gently on top.
Garnish with a cherry.

name: Banana Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a banana slice.

name: Basil Gimlet
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with syrup and lime juice in a shaker.
Add gin and ice, shake until chilled.
Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a basil leaf.

name: Batanga
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add tequila and lime juice, stir gently.
Top with cola and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Bee’s Kiss
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Bijou
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Blackthorn
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

name: Blue Hawaii
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a hurricane glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Bobby Burns
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Bronx Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Brooklyn
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

name: Brown Derby
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

name: Cable Car
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Californication
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add vodka, elderflower liqueur, and grapefruit juice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with grapefruit slice.

name: Cameron’s Kick
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with an apricot slice.

name: Candied Ginger Mule
instructions: Fill copper mug with ice.
Add vodka, lime juice, and ginger beer.
Stir gently and garnish with candied ginger.

name: Captain’s Blood
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with a cherry.

name: Carajillo
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur into a rocks glass.
Top with hot coffee, stir gently.
Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Casino
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a cherry or lemon twist.

name: Champs-Élysées
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Chartreuse Swizzle
instructions: Build over crushed ice in a Collins glass.
Swizzle until glass frosts.
Top with a bit more crushed ice and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Cherry Blossom
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a cherry or edible flower.

name: Clover Leaf
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into highball over ice, top with soda.
Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Commodore
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with cherry.

name: Cucumber Martini
instructions: Muddle cucumber in shaker.
Add liquor and vermouth with ice and stir.
Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with cucumber ribbon.

name: Cynar Spritz
instructions: Build over ice in a wine glass.
Stir gently and garnish with orange slice.

name: Daisy de Santiago
instructions: Shake all ingredients except soda with ice.
Strain into highball glass filled with ice.
Top with soda and garnish with lime wheel and mint sprig.

name: Derby Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: Dr. Funk
instructions: Shake all but soda with ice.
Strain into tiki mug filled with crushed ice.
Top with soda and garnish with mint and lime wheel.

name: Eastside
instructions: Muddle cucumber and mint with syrup and lime juice in shaker.
Add gin and ice, shake until chilled.
Double strain into a coupe glass and garnish with mint leaf.

name: El Presidente
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into chilled coupe.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: Emerald
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass with large ice cube.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: English Garden
instructions: Build in a highball glass over ice.
Top with soda and stir gently.
Garnish with cucumber slice or apple fan.

name: Espresso Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Fallen Leaves
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe and garnish with lemon twist.

name: Fancy Free
instructions: Stir with ice until well chilled.
Strain into rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with cherry and orange twist.

name: Foghorn
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with ginger beer and stir.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Forbidden Sour
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Fort Lauderdale
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into hurricane glass with crushed ice.
Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: French Pearl
instructions: Muddle mint and syrup, add other ingredients and ice.
Shake and double strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with mint leaf.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Pour into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Georgia Peach
instructions: Build in a highball glass with ice.
Add vodka and peach schnapps, top with juices.
Stir gently and garnish with peach slice.

name: Gibson
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice until chilled.
Strain into chilled martini glass.
Garnish with cocktail onion.

name: Godchild
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice.
Strain into rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with nutmeg sprinkle.

name: Golden Dream
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until creamy.
Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: Grapefruit Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass with salted rim and ice.
Garnish with grapefruit slice.

name: Green Ghost
instructions: Shake with ice until well chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lime twist.

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Stir with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: Hemingway Special
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe and garnish with grapefruit twist.

name: Honeysuckle
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Hotel Nacional
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into coupe.
Garnish with pineapple wedge.

name: In Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice.
Strain into rocks glass over large ice cube.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Italian Greyhound
instructions: Shake briefly with ice.
Strain into highball glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with grapefruit wedge.

name: Japanese Slipper
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into martini glass.
Garnish with cherry.

name: Jasmine
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: John Collins
instructions: Build in a Collins glass with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with lemon slice and cherry.

name: Jungle Juice
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large punch bowl.
Add ice and sliced fruit.
Stir gently and serve in individual glasses.

name: Kamikaze
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled shot glass.
Garnish with lime wedge if served as a cocktail.

name: Kentucky Buck
instructions: Muddle strawberries with syrup and lemon juice.
Add bourbon and ice, shake briefly.
Strain into Collins glass and top with ginger beer.
Garnish with strawberry.

name: Key Lime Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into chilled martini glass.
Garnish with lime twist or graham rim.

name: Ladykiller
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe and garnish with orange twist.

name: Lavender Lemonade
instructions: Build in a highball glass over ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with lavender sprig.

name: Lemon Basil Smash
instructions: Muddle basil with syrup and lemon juice.
Add gin and ice, shake until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass and garnish with basil sprig.

name: Lion’s Tail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lime twist.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
instructions: Build in a highball glass over ice.
Top with cranberry juice and stir gently.
Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Lucien Gaudin
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass and garnish with orange peel.

name: Lynchburg Buck
instructions: Build in a highball glass with ice.
Top with ginger beer and stir.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Mai Tai Swizzle
instructions: Add all ingredients to a tiki mug.
Swizzle with crushed ice until glass frosts.
Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Matador
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Melon Ball
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into highball glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with melon ball.

name: Mexican Firing Squad
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into highball with ice and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Midnight Stinger
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Millionaire
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lime twist.

name: Monte Carlo
instructions: Stir with ice until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass with large ice cube.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Naked and Famous
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel.

name: New York Sour
instructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and syrup with ice.
Strain into rocks glass over ice.
Float red wine on top using back of a spoon.

name: Nutty Irishman
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into rocks glass over large ice cube.
Garnish with orange twist.

name: Pain d’Epices
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Paper Plane Variation (Amaro-based)
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Passion Fruit Martini
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into martini glass.
Garnish with half a passion fruit.

name: Penicillin
instructions: Shake all but float with ice.
Strain into rocks glass over ice.
Float Islay Scotch on top and garnish with candied ginger.

name: Peppermint Patty
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with cocoa powder dust.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients without ice, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into coupe glass and garnish with bitters.

name: Pornstar Martini
instructions: Shake all but sparkling wine with ice.
Strain into martini glass and serve with sparkling wine on the side.

name: Porto Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice.
Strain into coupe glass and garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Queen’s Park Swizzle
instructions: Muddle mint and syrup in highball glass.
Add crushed ice, rum, and lime juice.
Swizzle until glass frosts, top with bitters and mint sprig.

name: Ramos Rum Fizz
instructions: Dry shake all but soda for 30 seconds, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into Collins glass and top with soda.
Allow foam to rise above rim.

name: Raspberry Mule
instructions: Muddle raspberries and lime juice in mug.
Add vodka and ice, top with ginger beer.
Garnish with raspberries and mint.

name: Red Snapper
instructions: Roll all ingredients with ice (don’t shake).
Pour into highball glass.
Garnish with celery stalk and lemon wedge.

name: Rum Flip
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into coupe and garnish with nutmeg.

name: Salted Caramel Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy.
Strain into martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans and caramel drizzle.

name: Scorpion
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into tiki mug with crushed ice.
Garnish with orange slice and mint.

name: Sherry Cobbler
instructions: Muddle orange slices and syrup in glass.
Add sherry and crushed ice.
Stir and garnish with berries.

name: Smoked Maple Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain over large cube.
Smoke glass before serving (optional).
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Winter Spritz
instructions: Build in a wine glass with ice.
Top with soda and stir gently.
Garnish with rosemary and cranberries.

name: Bourbon Pear-per Plane
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a thin pear slice.

name: Maple Bourbon Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into rocks glass with ice.
Garnish with lemon twist and a dusting of cinnamon.

name: Smoked Maple Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain over large cube.
Smoke the glass before serving if desired.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Blind Squirrel Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into rocks glass over large cube.
Garnish with candied pecan or orange twist.

name: Barrel Proof Manhattan
instructions: Stir with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass and garnish with brandied cherry.

name: Maple-Cinnamon Rum Punch
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over crushed ice.
Garnish with cinnamon stick and orange wheel.

name: Autumn Boulevardier
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Cranberry Bourbon Smash
instructions: Muddle cranberries and syrup, add bourbon and lemon juice.
Shake with ice and strain over ice.
Garnish with rosemary sprig.

name: Coconut Maple Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint and lime juice, add rum and maple syrup.
Top with soda and coconut water, stir gently.
Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Bourbon Espresso Flip
instructions: Dry shake, then add ice and shake again.
Strain into coupe and garnish with espresso beans.

name: Ginger Pear Spritz
instructions: Build in wine glass with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with pear slice.

name: Maple Chai Toddy
instructions: Build in mug and stir gently.
Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Maple Pecan Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake with ice until frothy.
Strain into martini glass.
Garnish with crushed pecans.

name: Vegan Whiskey Flip
instructions: Shake with ice until creamy.
Strain into coupe and dust with nutmeg.

name: Barrel Proof Maple Mule
instructions: Build in copper mug with ice.
Top with ginger beer and stir.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Pineapple Paper Plane
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a small pineapple wedge or dehydrated slice.

name: Spiced Maple Paper Plane
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist dusted lightly with cinnamon.

name: Tropical Rum Paper Plane
instructions: Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with lime wheel or dried pineapple.

name: Smoky Mezcal Paper Plane
instructions: Shake with ice until well chilled.
Strain into coupe glass.
Garnish with a thin orange peel twist.

name: Vegan Bourbon Flip (Aquafaba)
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker.
Dry Shake (without ice) vigorously for 30-60 seconds to create a stable foam from the aquafaba.
Add ice and shake again until well chilled and frothy.
Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
